Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Reroute at Damen/Milwaukee
ShortDescription: 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Division, Western, Armitage, and Damen, due to street blockage near Damen/Milwaukee.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Damen, Division, Western, Armitage, and Damen, due to street blockage near Damen/Milwaukee.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Midway-bound Orange Line Service Delayed at Kedzie
ShortDescription: Midway-bound Orange Line trains are standing at Kedzie due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Midway-bound Orange Line trains are standing at Kedzie due to police activity. Shuttle buses have been requested between Midway and Western provide connecting service through the affected area. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
